story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0100_1:
Aha! We meet again! Remember us?
Team Break baddies, comin’ atcha!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0200_1:
I was bad back in school, and I’m still bad now!
Who cares about math when bein’ bad feels
so good!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0300_1:
Can you count how many girls are on
this team? That’s right—one!
The same as my average test score!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0400_1:
We’re still the same Team Break baddies as
last time—except we’re different!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0500_1:
I am muscle! I am brawn! I am war!
I oversleep and run late—brutally late!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0600_1:
I am the Chief Intelligence Officer of the
Team Break baddies! My bovine brethren
will render you defenseless!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0101_0700_1: Uh...I dunno what that means, but...it’s showtime!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3801_0501_0200_1:
I think it’s time we disbanded the
Team Break baddies.
story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0100_1:
Let’s steal Pokémon—lots and lots of Pokémon!
And then conquer all of Pasio and rule it
ourselves! Yeah!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0200_1:
Mhmm... I like the way your mind works!
Let’s put our heads together and make it happen.
story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0300_1: You wanna get in on our plans, too, huh?
story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0400_1:
Wait a sec! Who are you?!
You better not be those brats who keep
running around beating our team members!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0500_1:
You trying to steal my Pokémon?!
Pokémon that I stole fair and square?
story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0101_0600_1:
You’re just a self-righteous goody-two-shoes!
I’ll make you regret messing with Team Break—
and I’ll be taking your Pokémon, too!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0501_0100_1:
W-wait! These Pokémon are our partners!
Don’t take them away!
story_zako_battle_20_06/3701_0501_0200_1:
We just wanted to live here in peace and quiet
with the stolen Pokémon... Is that so bad?
